immediate_actions: Pinch soft part of nose 10 mins

seek_medical_attention.timeframe: If lasts >20 mins, heavy flow, or frequent nosebleeds

full_protocol_text: Nosebleed: Sit up, lean forward. Pinch soft part of nose 10 mins continuously. Ice on bridge. Don't blow nose for several hours. Seek care if >20 mins or heavy flow.
